SOURCE: Black Mass 2015 Cam English Audio Latino Subs. Thanks who ever you are?

READNFO: SOURCE WAS 1024X576 = 1.77 AND HAD 2 LINES OF LATIN SUBS,PRETTY BAD FLICKER,NOISE,ORANGE/REDISH FACES,SOMEWHAT BLURRY ETC!

WORK DONE: NOT MUCH WE COULD DO ABOUT THE BLUR BUT WE RESIZED,CROPPED TOP AND BOTTOM BLACK BARS,BLURRED BOTTOM LINE OF SUBS AS WE DIDN'T WANNA CROP IT AND LOSE ANY VIDEO AND LEFT THE TOP LINE AS IS CAUSE WE DIDN'T WANNA BLUR THEIR LIPS LOL.
NEXT WE ADJUSTED SATURATION -28 (TO TRY AND GET RID OF THE RED/ORANGE FACES) INTENSITY +4 BRIGHT +10 AND CONTRAST - 4 TO TRY AND BRIGHTEN IT UP A BIT WITHOUT WASHING IT OUT ALTHO IT SEEMS LIKE IT WAS FILMED IN SOMEWHAT OF A 1970'S SETTING. LAST THING WE DID WAS RUN A FILTER TO TRY AND REMOVE SOME OF THE FLICKER AND NOISE AND RAN THE ENCODE THE END. THERE IS STILL SOME FLICKER!

AUDIO WAS A LITTLE OOS SO DID OUR BEST :D

IS THERE GONNA BE BETTER? WE ARE SURE THERE IS AND HOPE THERE IS!!! IN THE MEAN TIME WE FOUND THIS AND DID WHAT WE COULD :) IF YOU DON'T WANT IT THAT'S COOL JUST KEEP IT MOVING! FOR THOSE THAT APPRECIATE IT'S PEOPLE LIKE YOU THAT KEEP THE CAPPERS,ENCODERS,UPLOADERS AND P2P ALIVE THANKS :wink:

RATINGS....V/5 A/7 BUT THAT IS OUR OPINION FOR A CAM.

1 SAMPLE INCLUDED SO CHECK IT FIRST!!!!!!!!!!!
